Articles.Content: Hello everyone, I've been playing KSP since Christmastime, keep coming back here looking for mods and bug fixes and so on so I thought I would introduce myself. On my third career save now (excepting a few false-starts), working on orbiting Jeb round the Mun... might've gotten further than that by now if I didn't keep installing more mods and having to start over!
Welcome to the forums! I usually don't play with mods. I like to keep it vanilla, personally, but I do wish you well on your modifimicated journey!
Welcome to the forums Hotaru, Yes the modding community here is very very active... on my current install i am playing with about 30 mods.
